title: Food wastewater treatment using a hybrid biofilm reactor: nutrient removal performance and functional microorganisms on filler biofilm and suspended sludge
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22470-22479
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01631A, Paper
Open Access

Zhenjun Tian, Ying Xiong, Guowen Li, Xiaoxin Cao, Xin Li, Caili Du, Lieyu Zhang
In this study, a laboratory-scale hybrid biofilm reactor (HBR) was constructed to treat food wastewater (FWW) before it is discharged into the sewer.
